com.konakart.blif

Interface ExportMgrIf

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ExportMgr, ExportMgrEE

    public interface ExportMgrIf
    Used to export data

      • updateObject

        void updateObject(java.lang.String storeId,
                int objectType,
                int operationType,
                int kkObjectId)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Writes an updateObject message to the queue.
        Parameters:
        storeId -
        objectType - Determines the type of object
        • KKConstants.UPDATE_OBJECT_TYPE_ORDER
        • KKConstants.UPDATE_OBJECT_TYPE_CUSTOMER
        operationType - Determines the type of operation
        • KKConstants.UPDATE_OPERATION_TYPE_CREATE
        • KKConstants.UPDATE_OPERATION_TYPE_UPDATE
        • KKConstants.UPDATE_OPERATION_TYPE_DELETE
        kkObjectId - Id of the KonaKart object being updated
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • updateObject

        void updateObject(java.lang.String storeId,
                int objectType,
                int operationType,
                int kkObjectId,
                java.lang.String objectId1,
                java.lang.String objectId2,
                java.lang.String value1,
                java.lang.String value2)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Writes an updateObject message to the queue.
        Parameters:
        storeId -
        objectType - Determines the type of object
        • KKConstants.UPDATE_OBJECT_TYPE_ORDER
        • KKConstants.UPDATE_OBJECT_TYPE_CUSTOMER
        operationType - Determines the type of operation
        • KKConstants.UPDATE_OPERATION_TYPE_CREATE
        • KKConstants.UPDATE_OPERATION_TYPE_UPDATE
        • KKConstants.UPDATE_OPERATION_TYPE_DELETE
        kkObjectId - Id of the KonaKart object being updated
        objectId1 - Additional identifier that can be used by the ERP to identify the object.
        objectId2 - Additional identifier that can be used by the ERP to identify the object.
        value1 - Optional value to simplify the processing of the message.
        value2 - Optional value to simplify the processing of the message.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • isUpdateObjectEnabled

                            int operationType)
                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Utility that returns true or false depending to determine whether a message should be exported when an object has been modified
        Parameters:

        operationType - Determines the type of operation
        • KKConstants.UPDATE_OPERATION_TYPE_CREATE
        • KKConstants.UPDATE_OPERATION_TYPE_UPDATE
        • KKConstants.UPDATE_OPERATION_TYPE_DELETE
        Returns:
        Returns true if the message should be sent
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
